font.marquee: Clarinda Schools will remain closed through May 31, 2020.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 12:55 pm CDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 60. North northeast wind around 10 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers, mainly after 4am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 37. North northeast wind around 6 mph becoming calm in the evening. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly before 10am. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 65. Light and variable wind becoming west 9 to 14 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

font.marquee: Clarinda Schools will remain closed through May 31, 2020.
